mapper.insert: insert into t_contract_change(id, project_id, csa_code, management_rate, change_amount, trice, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, description, status) values ( #{id}, #{projectId}, #{csaCode}, #{managementRate}, #{changeAmount}, #{trice}, now(), #{createUser}, now(), #{createUser}, #{description}, #{status} )
mapper.update: update t_contract_change set project_id = #{projectId}, csa_code = #{csaCode}, management_rate = #{managementRate}, change_amount = #{changeAmount}, trice = #{trice}, update_time = now(), update_user = #{updateUser}, description = #{description}, status = #{status}, version = version + 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id as id, project_id as projectId, csa_code as csaCode, management_rate as managementRate, change_amount as changeAmount, trice as trice, create_time as createTime, create_user as createUser, update_time as updateTime, update_user as updateUser, description as description, version as version, status as status from t_contract_change where id = #{id}
